channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX/GRA][Baremetal] - Network equipment maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 13, 19:00 UTC  -  Jul 14, 01:00 UTC

Jun 13, 23:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/07/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/07/2023 01:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement services, we will be upgrading the version of a network equipment.

item.title: [GRA1/WAW1/RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 12, 21:00 UTC  -  Jul 13, 01:00 UTC

Jun 15, 01:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/07/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 13/07/2023 01:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

item.title: [GRA1/WAW1/RBX7][Network] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 6, 21:00 UTC  -  Jul 7, 01:00 UTC

Jun 20, 02:03 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/07/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 07/07/2023 01:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on a network equipment.

item.title: [GRA1//WAW1/RBX7][Network] - Network equipement operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 5, 21:00 UTC  -  Jul 6, 01:00 UTC

Jun 15, 01:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/07/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 06/07/2023 01:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will do an operation on a network equipment.
